metadata.title: Games Collection
metadata.description: Steam-inspired gaming dataset with categories, genres, platforms, and metadata for cataloging your game library.
metadata.author: R3VISIT

content_type.name: Games
content_type.description: Digital adventures that have entertained me.

categories.name: Adventure
categories.description: Games that focus on exploration, story, and puzzle-solving.

categories.name: Action
categories.description: Games emphasizing physical challenges and hand-eye coordination.

categories.name: RPG
categories.description: Role-playing games where players control characters in a fictional setting.

categories.name: Strategy
categories.description: Games that emphasize planning and skillful thinking to achieve victory.

categories.name: Simulation
categories.description: Games that simulate real-world or fictional activities.

categories.name: Fighting
categories.description: Games centered around close combat between characters.

categories.name: Shooter
categories.description: Games focused on shooting enemies or targets.

categories.name: Horror
categories.description: Games designed to scare or unsettle the player.

categories.name: MMO
categories.description: Massively multiplayer online games with large player communities.

demo_data.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
demo_data.description: You are Geralt of Rivia, mercenary monster slayer. Before you stands a war-torn, monster-infested continent you can explore at will. Your current contract? Tracking down Ciri — the Child of Prophecy, a living weapon that can alter the shape of the world.

metadata.about: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is a story-driven, next-generation open world role-playing game set in a visually stunning fantasy universe full of meaningful choices and impactful consequences.
metadata.system-requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 8 (8.1) or 10 | Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940 | Memory: 6 GB RAM | Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870

demo_data.name: Elden Ring
demo_data.description: THE NEW FANTASY ACTION RPG. Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.

metadata.about: THE NEW FANTASY ACTION RPG. Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.
metadata.system-requirements: OS: Windows 10 | Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X | Memory: 12 GB RAM | Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB

demo_data.name: Cyberpunk 2077
demo_data.description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.

metadata.about: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.
metadata.system-requirements: OS: Windows 10 | Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310 | Memory: 8 GB RAM | Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 470

demo_data.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
demo_data.description: America, 1899. The end of the Wild West era has begun. After a robbery goes badly wrong in the western town of Blackwater, Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are forced to flee.

metadata.about: America, 1899. The end of the Wild West era has begun. After a robbery goes badly wrong in the western town of Blackwater, Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are forced to flee.
metadata.system-requirements: OS: Windows 10 - April 2018 Update (v1803) | Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300 | Memory: 8 GB RAM | Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB

demo_data.name: Counter-Strike 2
demo_data.description: For over two decades, Counter-Strike has offered an elite competitive experience, one shaped by millions of players from across the globe. And now the next chapter in the CS story is about to begin.

metadata.about: For over two decades, Counter-Strike has offered an elite competitive experience, one shaped by millions of players from across the globe. And now the next chapter in the CS story is about to begin.
metadata.system-requirements: OS: Windows 10 | Processor: 4 hardware CPU threads - Intel® Core™ i5 750 or higher | Memory: 8 GB RAM | Graphics: Video card must be 1 GB or more and should be a DirectX 11-compatible

demo_data.name: Baldur's Gate 3
demo_data.description: Baldur's Gate 3 is a story-rich, party-based RPG set in the universe of Dungeons & Dragons, where your choices shape a tale of fellowship and betrayal, survival and sacrifice, and the lure of absolute power.

metadata.about: Baldur's Gate 3 is a story-rich, party-based RPG set in the universe of Dungeons & Dragons, where your choices shape a tale of fellowship and betrayal, survival and sacrifice, and the lure of absolute power.
metadata.system-requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit | Processor: Intel I5 4690 / AMD FX 8350 | Memory: 8 GB RAM | Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)

demo_data.name: Hades
demo_data.description: Hades is a god-like rogue-like dungeon crawler that combines the best aspects of Supergiant's critically acclaimed titles, including the fast-paced action of Bastion, the rich atmosphere and depth of Transistor, and the character-driven storytelling of Pyre.

metadata.about: Hades is a god-like rogue-like dungeon crawler that combines the best aspects of Supergiant's critically acclaimed titles, including the fast-paced action of Bastion, the rich atmosphere and depth of Transistor, and the character-driven storytelling of Pyre.
metadata.system-requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 | Processor: Dual Core 3.0ghz | Memory: 4 GB RAM | Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible | DirectX: Version 10

demo_data.name: Stardew Valley
demo_data.description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?

metadata.about: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?
metadata.system-requirements: OS: Windows Vista or greater | Processor: 2 Ghz | Memory: 2 GB RAM | Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+ | DirectX: Version 10

demo_data.name: Doom Eternal
demo_data.description: Hell's armies have invaded Earth. Become the Slayer in an epic single-player campaign to conquer demons across dimensions and stop the final destruction of humanity.

metadata.about: Hell's armies have invaded Earth. Become the Slayer in an epic single-player campaign to conquer demons across dimensions and stop the final destruction of humanity.
metadata.system-requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7 / 64-Bit Windows 10 | Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better | Memory: 8 GB RAM | Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti (4GB), GTX 1060 (3GB), GTX 1650 (4GB) or AMD Radeon R9 280(3GB), AMD Radeon R9 290 (4GB), RX 470 (4GB)

demo_data.name: Hollow Knight
demo_data.description: Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes. Explore twisting caverns, battle tainted creatures and befriend bizarre bugs, all in a classic, hand-drawn 2D style.

metadata.about: Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes. Explore twisting caverns, battle tainted creatures and befriend bizarre bugs, all in a classic, hand-drawn 2D style.
metadata.system-requirements: OS: Windows 7 | Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200 | Memory: 4 GB RAM | Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB) | DirectX: Version 10
